thread.title: Get Ready For One Hour Of Alec Baldwin Going In On Donald Trump… We Hope!
thread.title_full: Get Ready For One Hour Of Alec Baldwin Going In On Donald Trump… We Hope!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Get Ready For One Hour Of Alec Baldwin Going In On Donald Trump… We Hope!
text:
Celebs React To Donald Trump's Stupid Ass Nordstrom Tweet! 
Don't worry, guys -- Nordstrom is doing just fine! 
The retailer took a minor stock hit after Donald Trump tweeted that they were treating Ivanka Trump "unfairly" for dropping her poorly-selling fashion line, but the stock bounced back quickly and continues to climb. 
Related: SNL Is Having Its Best Ratings In Decades 
That may be in part due to the fact that plenty of people are supporting the department store amid Trump's stupid and, frankly, unethical tweet. 
Included in those supporting Nordstrom are some of our fave celebs, like Beth Behrs and Chelsea Peretti , who promised they'd be hitting up the store! Ha! 
Still, others like Kal Penn and Justin Long were quick to point out that Drumpf happened to send out the tweet during his daily Intelligence Briefing! Ridic!!! 
He's supposed to be paying attention to what his advisers are telling him about the country, not worrying about his grown child! 
Jesus Effing Christ. We are all screwed. 
Anyway, see the best reactions (below)!
